title: Towards combining backbone and sugar constraint in 3′-3′ bis-phosphonate tethered 2′-4′ bridged LNA oligonucleotide trimers
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,23583-23591
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04277H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Edouard Duchamp, Guillermo Vasquez, Neda Firoozi, Graeme C. Freestone, Michael Oestergaard, Punit P. Seth, Stephen Hanessian
The synthesis of alkylphosphonate-linked locked nucleic acid (LNA) trimers which restrict conformation of the furanose sugar and conformational mobility of the sugar-phosphate backbone across three nucleotide units is described.
